title: [Large-Scale] Higher Education E-Learning Metrics Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Core E-Learning Concepts and Experience in Higher Education Institution Operations
context.additional_context: Capacity-building for developing customized e-learning evaluation systems for working adult learners

learning_goals: Systematically classify seven core indicators of higher education e-learning through literature analysis
Apply a method to evaluate the content validity of indicators using expert verification procedures
Propose a plan to integrate indicators developed in blended learning environments into actual corporate training programs
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
